rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
芦笋根提取物成为有前途的天然乳化剂和潜在的抗肥胖剂《食品》杂志上的研究描述了芦笋根中皂苷提取物的特征，强调了它们在食品和化妆品中作为天然乳化剂和发泡剂的潜力，以及它们对胰腺脂肪酶的抑制活性，表明其在抗肥胖方面的应用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Asparagus-root-extracts-emerge-as-promising-natural-emulsifiers-and-pottial-anti-obesity-agents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Asparagus-root-extracts-emerge-as-promising-natural-emulsifiers-and-pottial-anti-obesity-agents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a79bad2-405d-4951-9397-65ca094e2088 Tue, 16 Jan 2024 23:15:00 -0500 Asparagus root extracts emerge as promising natural emulsifiers and potential anti-obesity agents
人工智能在检测风湿性心脏病方面表现出与心脏病专家相同的准确性最新研究表明，人工智能 (AI) 有潜力以与心脏病专家相同的准确度来检测风湿性心脏病 (RHD)，该研究展示了如何将复杂的深度学习技术应用于这种不公平的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/AI-shows-the-same-accuracy-as-a-cardiograph-in-detecting-rheumatic-heart-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/AI-shows-the-same-accuracy-as-a-cardiograph-in-detecting-rheumatic-heart-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5bbe3c6a-5256-4b9c-9835-ee2dfac4fda5 Tue, 16 Jan 2024 22:55:30 -0500 AI shows the same accuracy as a cardiologist in detecting rheumatic heart disease
研究表明怀孕期间增加使用对乙酰氨基酚与儿童注意力缺陷有关一项新的研究表明，怀孕期间（尤其是妊娠中期）增加使用对乙酰氨基酚与 2 岁、3 岁和 4 岁儿童的注意力和行为问题略有但明显的增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Study-links-increased-use-of-acetaminophen-during-pregnancy-and-attention-deficits-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Study-links-increased-use-of-acetaminophen-during-pregnancy-and-attention-deficits-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fbfb1a0c-9fd5-4cc6-9085-a1822d24a37d Tue, 16 Jan 2024 22:49:41 -0500 Study links increased use of acetaminophen during pregnancy and attention deficits in children
影响 GLP-1 分泌的饮食因素：糖尿病和肥胖治疗的新视角《美国临床营养学杂志》的研究人员回顾了饮食对肥胖和 2 型糖尿病等代谢性疾病中 GLP-1 分泌的影响，强调了其在治疗和预防方面的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Dietary-factors-influencing-GLP-1-secretion-a-new-perspective-in-diabetes-and-obesity-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Dietary-factors-influencing-GLP-1-secretion-a-new-perspective-in-diabetes-and-obesity-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84ad4474-479d-434a-a36d-403a5ddaff0b Tue, 16 Jan 2024 22:43:00 -0500 Dietary factors influencing GLP-1 secretion: a new perspective in diabetes and obesity treatment
研究揭示大麻如何影响大脑的进食中心众所周知，大麻会引起食欲，但研究人员现在在华盛顿州立大学的一系列动物研究中揭示了大脑中促进食欲的机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Study-unveils-how-cannabis-affects-brains-feeding-center.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Study-unveils-how-cannabis-affects-brains-feeding-center.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45e2de37-e54e-492d-a372-89a21728e454 Tue, 16 Jan 2024 22:40:44 -0500 Study unveils how cannabis affects brain's feeding center
研究项目旨在开发突破性数字技术以改善心脏和大脑健康《美国心脏协会杂志》的一期特刊重点关注了正在进行的项目的进展情况，这些项目旨在开发突破性的数字技术解决方案，以改善全球范围内的心脏和大脑健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Research-projects-aim-to-develop-breakthrough-digital-technology-for-improving-heart-and-brain-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Research-projects-aim-to-develop-breakthrough-digital-technology-for-improving-heart-and-brain-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73ab8a1c-c004-4261-ad7e-05f42ef20aeb Tue, 16 Jan 2024 22:03:18 -0500 Research projects aim to develop breakthrough digital technology for improving heart and brain health
使用激光和纳米温度计的新型伤口闭合技术5000多年前的某个时候，人类想出了用针和线缝合伤口的想法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Novel-wound-closure-technique-using-lasers-and-nano-thermometers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Novel-wound-closure-technique-using-lasers-and-nano-thermometers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2258e083-e65b-43c7-8fa7-7b7e597c8cbe Tue, 16 Jan 2024 21:58:26 -0500 Novel wound closure technique using lasers and nano-thermometers
日常活跃通勤与较低水平的炎症相关东芬兰大学、芬兰健康与福利研究所和芬兰职业健康研究所进行的一项新研究表明，每天至少 45 分钟的积极通勤与较低的 C-水平有关反应蛋白（CRP），炎症的关键标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Daily-active-commuting-linked-with-lower-levels-of-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Daily-active-commuting-linked-with-lower-levels-of-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53769bbf-f771-425d-b743-a05a3e4a39c8 Tue, 16 Jan 2024 21:51:15 -0500 Daily active commuting associated with lower levels of inflammation
慢性炎症和贫困共同增加死亡风险佛罗里达大学公共卫生与健康专业学院研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，生活在贫困中的慢性炎症患者在未来 15 年内死于心脏病的风险将增加一倍以上，死于癌症的风险将增加近三倍年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Chronic-inflammation-and-poverty-join-forces-to-increase-mortality-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Chronic-inflammation-and-poverty-join-forces-to-increase-mortality-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=502a7a7d-ea2b-46cc-a367-b8ecf162c58f Tue, 16 Jan 2024 21:40:28 -0500 Chronic inflammation and poverty join forces to increase mortality risk
英国大型研究突显了 COVID-19 疫苗覆盖率的差距第一项针对整个英国人口的研究突显了 COVID-19 疫苗覆盖率的差距。到 2022 年夏季，这四个英国国家有三分之一到一半的人口尚未接种建议数量的新冠疫苗和加强疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Large-UK-study-highlights-gaps-in-COVID-19-vaccine-coverage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Large-UK-study-highlights-gaps-in-COVID-19-vaccine-coverage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6accf059-af64-44a5-aec5-6cf5bc236560 Tue, 16 Jan 2024 21:14:53 -0500 Large UK study highlights gaps in COVID-19 vaccine coverage
